divs: Sighting Detailsme and my brother were sitting outside talking when he said hey what is that? well i dont believe him. but he is like wow its gone. well i know that he is a non believer, and i know that he knows that i am.so i thought he was playing.ive always wanted to see one. tonight i did. well well anyway every time i look away he,s saying oh u just missed it. so im thinking yea right . then i saw it. i will never be the saME. IT WAS Huge, with a triangulure shape. my brother said ,;do you see it now;? and isaid yes, and it disapeered. it freaked me out. but he took it all in stride. i looked and looked but so far have not seen it again. wow i am not kidding.
